excerpt: "\"On the freeway, one bad decision propagates other bad decisions. If we can consider what's happening 300 meters in front of us, it can really improve road safety. It reduces congestion and accidents.\" Michighan Tech engineer Kuilin Zhang studies how features like smart cruise control can improve driver performance.
